00030 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00031 {
00032 
00033 /*! This class will convert a CEL file to ASCII format. */
00034 class CELFileConvertToASCII
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00038         /*! Constructor */
00039         CELFileConvertToASCII();
00040 
00041         /*! Destructor */
00042         ~CELFileConvertToASCII();
00043 
00044         /*! Gets the error code for the conversion process.
00045          * @return The error code associated with the last failure.
00046          */
00047         CELFileConverterErrorCode ErrorCode() const { return errorCode; }
00048 
00049         /*! Convert the Calvin file to ASCII format.
00050          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00051          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00052          * @return True if successful.
00053          */
00054         bool ConvertCalvinFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00055 
00056         /*! Convert the XDA file to ASCII format.
00057          * @param fileName The full path name of the CEL file.
00058          * @param newFile The name of the new CEL file.
00059          * @return True if successful.
00060          */
00061         bool ConvertXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options = NULL);
00062 
00063 private:
00064 
00065         /*! The error code. */
00066         CELFileConverterErrorCode errorCode;
00067

00069         void Clear();
00070 
00071 };
